strategic planning, alliances, all sales-related channels, and campaigns in the market

-Liaising with peers in the Turkish and European management team  CANDIDATE
FATIH AKILLI
PERSONAL DETAILS
LOCATION
Gebze, Kocaeli
QUALIFICATIONS
Black Sea Technical University 1999 – 2003
Faculty of Science, Chemistry
CAREER SUMMARY
3M Company (8 years 4 months)
Country Sales Manager 02.2023 – Present
-Leading, directing, managing and developing the Turkey Automotive Aftermarket Division
-Being responsible for sales, profit, expense, and customer experience objectives including the establishment of budgets, forecasts,
strategic planning, alliances, all sales-related channels, and campaigns in the market
-Achieving market and share growth as defined in ongoing strategic planning
-Representing Turkish market trends and requirements in the country’s development of its long-term strategic plan
-Liaising with peers in the Turkish and European management team to develop and execute key initiatives that help the country and
company achieve their respective objectives
-Engaging with customers & key opinion leaders to guide and challenge developments in their sphere of influence
-Promoting and reinforcing the values of the company to customers across the country
-Leading/promoting organizational design options for future growth in the Turkish sales organization to improve the efficiency and
effectiveness of the organization
Senior Technical Leader 02.2019 – 01.2023
-Providing technical solutions, process mappings, and identifying go-to portfolios to Transportation and Industrial Markets in EMEA
-Working closely with EMEA business teams to support regional sales and technical activities
-Supporting the EMEA Automotive Aftermarket Division business team to create SOPs, brochures, catalogs, and videos
-Developing new applications and new spec-in to support business growth in prioritized segments
-Supporting new product projects with leading new product VOC analysis, field test, and commercialization activities in EMEA
-Organizing product, technology and process trainings or webinars to customers, distributor sales responsibles, sales colleagues and
application engineers in EMEA
-Coaching and mentoring Application Engineers to increase their experience in prioritized segments
-Trouble-shooting and handling quality complaints in EMEA
-Communicating and cooperating with global colleagues to create new opportunities for prioritized segments in EMEA
-Supporting Turkey Automotive Aftermarket Division team for all technical activities
Technical Leader 11.2015 – 01.2019
-Providing technical solutions to Automotive Aftermarket customers especially for Multible Shop Organizations, Transportation OEMs, and
Key Accounts in Turkey
-Developing new application and new spec-in to support business growth
-Working closely with sales, marketing, manufacturing and other relevant colleagues to gain market share
-Supporting marketing to create local SOPs, brochures, catalogs and videos
-Supporting new product projects with leading new product VOC analysis, field test and commercialization activities
-Organizing product, technology and process trainings to customers, distributor sales responsibles and sales colleagues
-Trouble-shooting and handling quality complaints
-Communicating and cooperating with global colleagues to create new opportunities
Renault Group (4 years 6 months)
Technical Sales Manager 04.2011 – 10.2015
-Leading, directing, managing and developing the Turkey Ixell (Paint & Consumables products brand), Ixtar (Auto Care products brand),
Renault Quick Repair project and technical seles team
-Being responsible for sales, profit, expense and customer experience objectives including establishment of budgets, forecasts, strategic
planning, alliances and all sales related channels, campaigns in the market
-Achieving market and share growth as defined in ongoing strategic planning
-Representing Turkish market trends and requirements in the country’s development of its long-term strategic plan
-Engaing with customers & key opinion leaders to guide and challenge developments in their sphere of influence
-Promoting and reinforcing the values of the company to customers across the country
-Organizing products, technology and standard operating procedures trainings to sales team, body shop managers and technicians
-L

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
